content: this cowl is inspired by the symbol of the night court from the series a court of thorns and roses the inside of the cowl is inspired by fayre s tattoo as high lady i hope you enjoy this pattern as it is my first if you are here because you like the design but are not a fan of the books just be aware people may recognize it and ask if you are a fan i used malabrigo ultimate sock yarn in the colorways under the sea and natural approximately 370 yards 87 grams of main color and 140 yards 33 grams of contrast color in a sock weight yarn this pattern is worked in the round with larger needles first for the mountains then smaller needles for the sworls and roses the inside is then folded in and either sewn or knit togther there is a typo in the finished size of the project the final dimensions are 22 inches around by 7 5 inches tall or 56 cm around by 19 cm tall the pdf says 9 cm tall this is incorrect
